Flint.Bendle High School:
Bendle High School is a public high school in Burton, Michigan, part of the Bendle Public Schools school district in Genessee County in the U.S. state of Michigan.


== History ==
In 1928 in the southern portion of what was then Burton Township, the first Bendle School, which served kindergarten to 12th grade, opened. It continued to serve the students of the area until the township's population growth after World War II resulted in overcrowding.
